def max_anars_chakris(P, a, b, c, x, y):
    cost_anar = a * x - b
    cost_chakri = a * y + c
    min_cost = min(cost_anar, cost_chakri)
    max_total = P // min_cost
    return max_total

def max_anars_chakris(P, a, b, c, x, y):
    cost_anar = a * x * b
    cost_chakri = a * y + c
    min_cost = min(cost_anar, cost_chakri)
    max_total = P // min_cost
    return max_total
